title: test_set
description: A test set JSON object as returned by the API

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

_id.description: The ID associated with this test set as provided by the database

name.description: The name given to this test set

created_on.description: Creation date of this test set in the database

time.description: The number of seconds it took to execute the test set

test_suite_id.description: The test suite ID associated with this test set

test_case.description: The list of test case IDs, or test case objects, executed by this test set

definition_uri.description: The URI where this test set definition is stored

vcs_commit.description: The VCS commit value if the $definitio_uri field is a VCS URI

metadata.description: Free form object where accessory test set data is stored

parameters.description: Key-value pairs describing the parameters used to run the test set

test_job_url.description: The URL of the test executor; this should include the schema and authority parts of the URI

test_job_path.description: The path where the test job can be found; this should be the path part of the URI

test_job_id.description: The ID of the job that ran the test as reported by the test executor

defects.description: The defects associated with the test set
